    • Method Detail

      • withBackendCacheSize

        ChronoGraphTuplBuilder withBackendCacheSize(long backendCacheSize)
        Explicitly sets the size of the cache for the backend TUPL store, in bytes.

        The default value is 209715200 bytes (= 200MB).

        This setting corresponds to ChronoDBConfiguration.STORAGE_BACKEND_CACHE.

        Parameters:
        backendCacheSize - The desired maximum size of the backend cache, in bytes. Default is 200MB. Must be strictly greater than zero.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
